Instance.description: Tuning data related to EP12 puberty

TunableEnum.name: AcneLevelTagCategory
TunableEnum.description: Tag category used to specify the level of a given acne part

TunableList.name: AcneLevelTags
TunableList.description: List of acne level tags checked by the puberty system

TunableEnum.name: AcneSkinToneTagCategory
TunableEnum.description: Tag category used to specify the skin tone of a given acne part

TunableEnum.name: HairColorTagCategory
TunableEnum.description: Tag category used to specify the color of a given body hair part

TunableEnum.name: HairLengthTagCategory
TunableEnum.description: Tag category used to specify the length of a given body hair part

TunableList.name: HairLengthTags
TunableList.description: List of hair length tags checked by the puberty system

TunableEnum.name: HairStyleTagCategory
TunableEnum.description: Tag category used to specify the style of a given body hair part
